short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter YouTube feed based on slots

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to create personalized content slots, filtering your feed to show only the videos and playlists you want to see. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to a more focused, enjoyable YouTube browsing experience.
